name: Civil War Postman 1918
description:
You have been tasked to deliver mail for people caught inside Tampere during the civil war. Both sides think you are a military courier and are likely to shoot you.

Watch for snipers on the windows and stay behind cover. Press mouse1 to deliver letter to mailboxes and use mouse wheel to cycle letters.
Godspeed postman!

Credits:
Petri Majamäki - Programming
Jaakko Siren - Programming
Antti Koponen - Graphics
Gautam Vishwanath - Graphics

Mikko Nykänen - Museum specialist

Used material:
